Task 3.original_description: A small Indian village challenges the British Empire to a cricket match.
Task 3.plot_twist: Based on this description: A small Indian village challenges the British Empire to a cricket match., generate a surprising plot twist or alternate ending. It follows a boy who makes a fateful decision to go to the local Cricket Authority because he is afraid of a man he identifies with and who knows exactly who he is. He comes from a wealthy family in a remote village that had always stood in the way of England, never allowing him to go. He meets a former English official and gets out of his house.
